title: Game-Based IT Fluency Development: Learning Through Simulations and Mod Creation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer literacy and basic understanding of digital environments
context.additional_context: Learners have experience using digital tools in daily life and work but have limited exposure to in-depth IT system understanding or creative application

learning_goals: Learners will acquire the ability to analyze and manage complex systems in a game environment.
Learners will enhance logical problem-solving skills by creating and manipulating spatial representations through modding.
Learners will understand the principles of algorithmic and system interactions through experimentation with in-game tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
